sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO t_security_rqst_ctlg ( incdt_idtf_cd, rqst_date, rqstr_srvno, ctlg_cd, ctlg_itm_cd_1, state_cd, rqst_ctnt, rsn, new_yn, seq ) VALUES ( #incdt_idtf_cd#, SYSDATE, #rqstr_srvno#, #ctlg_cd#, #ctlg_itm_cd_1#, #state_cd#, #rqst_ctnt#, #rsn#, #new_yn#, (SELECT NVL(MAX(seq), 0) FROM t_security_rqst_ctlg)+1 )
sqlMap.select: SELECT *, TO_CHAR(rqst_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS rqst_date, (SELECT ctlg_nm FROM t_security_ctlg_cd WHERE ctlg_cd = A.ctlg_cd) AS ctlg_nm FROM t_security_rqst_ctlg A WHERE rqstr_srvno = #srvno# ORDER BY rqst_date DESC

SELECT *, (SELECT cd_nm FROM t_security_code WHERE cd=A.ctlg_cd) AS ctlg_nm, (SELECT ctlg_itm_ctnt FROM t_security_ctlg WHERE ctlg_itm_cd=A.ctlg_itm_cd_1) AS ctlg_itm_nm, (SELECT rspofc_nm FROM t_security_user WHERE srvno=A.rqstr_srvno) AS rqstr_nm, (SELECT cd_nm FROM t_security_code A, t_security_user B WHERE B.srvno=rqstr_srvno AND A.cd=B.rnkcd) AS rqstr_rnk FROM t_security_rqst_ctlg A WHERE incdt_idtf_cd = #incdt_idtf_cd# and state_cd = 'D1' ORDER BY rqst_date DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT *, (SELECT cd_nm FROM t_security_code WHERE cd = A.ctlg_cd) AS ctlg_nm, (SELECT ctlg_itm_ctnt FROM t_security_ctlg WHERE ctlg_itm_cd = A.ctlg_itm_cd_1) AS ctlg_itm_nm FROM t_security_rqst_ctlg A WHERE seq = #seq#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_security_rqst_ctlg WHERE incdt_idtf_cd = #incdt_idtf_cd# AND state_cd = 'D1'

SELECT *, TO_CHAR(rqst_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS rqst_date, (SELECT ctlg_nm FROM t_security_ctlg_cd WHERE ctlg_cd = A.ctlg_cd) AS ctlg_nm FROM t_security_rqst_ctlg A WHERE rqstr_srvno = #srvno# AND state_cd != 'D2' ORDER BY rqst_date DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT seq, rqst_date, (SELECT rspofc_nm FROM t_security_user B WHERE rqstr_srvno = B.srvno) AS rqstr_srvno, (SELECT ctlg_nm FROM t_security_ctlg_cd B WHERE A.CTLG_CD = b.ctlg_cd) AS ctlg_cd, CASE WHEN ctlg_itm_cd_1 = '-1' THEN '' ELSE (SELECT CTLG_ITM_CTNT FROM t_security_ctlg B WHERE A.CTLG_ITM_CD_1 = B.CTLG_ITM_CD) END AS ctlg_itm_cd_1, (ctlg_itm_cd_1) AS ctlg_itm_cd_2, rqst_ctnt, (SELECT cd_nm FROM t_security_code b WHERE a.state_cd = b.cd) as state_cd, rsn, CASE WHEN new_yn = '1' THEN 'Y' WHEN new_yn = 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS new_yn, opn FROM t_security_rqst_ctlg A where incdt_idtf_cd = #incdt_idtf_cd#
rqst_date = #rqst_date#
rqstr_srvno in (select srvno from t_security_user where rspofc_nm like '%'|| #rqstr_srvno#||'%')
ctlg_cd in (select ctlg_cd from t_security_ctlg_cd where ctlg_nm like '%' || #ctlg_cd# || '%')
state_cd = #state_cd#
new_yn = 1
new_yn NOT LIKE 1
(SELECT CTLG_ITM_CTNT FROM t_security_ctlg B WHERE A.CTLG_ITM_CD_1 = B.CTLG_ITM_CD) LIKE '%' || #ctlg_itm_cd_1# || '%'
rqst_ctnt like '%' || #rqst_ctnt# || '%'
order by rqst_date desc

SELECT *, (SELECT cd_nm FROM t_security_code WHERE cd=A.ctlg_cd) AS ctlg_nm FROM t_security_rqst_ctlg A
A.rqstr_srvno = #rqstr_srvno#
A.rqst_date = #rqst_date#
A.state_cd = #state_cd#
(SELECT cd_nm FROM t_security_code WHERE cd=A.ctlg_cd) like '%' || #ctlg_nm# || '%'
ORDER BY rqst_date DESC
